text: A chinese dialogue about booking a doctorâ€™s appointment.Xiao Ming: Hello, hello! I am Xiao Ming.Xiaohong: Hello, Xiao Ming, how can I help you?Xiao Ming: Does Dr. Zhang have space to see me at noon today?Xiaohong: Dr. Zhang is not available at noon, but she is free in the afternoon.Xiao Ming: Ok, I will go to the hospital to find her in the afternoon! Thanks, bye!
